room_title: Escape room "Escape from Seattle - the World's Fair Affair" by Puzzle Break in Seattle
review: Way fun. Great staff, challenging puzzles! Great way to spend a Saturday evening with family and friends.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Seattle - the World's Fair Affair" by Puzzle Break in Seattle
review: Puzzle Break is really one of my favorite places to go. We've done 4 rooms and their street event and can't wait for new rooms to be announced.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Seattle - the World's Fair Affair" by Puzzle Break in Seattle
review: Puzzle Break is the best - their staff is amazing and the rooms are SUPER well designed. I've done a few puzzle rooms with other companies that don't even come close to the experience you get with Puzzle Break. I've done the 20,000 leagues under the sea, as well as the Seattle-themed World's Fair room. Both were very well designed with really unique puzzles and really really cool technology. Highly recommend.
